mapper.select: SELECT s.section_id, s.section_name, s.section_sh_name, s.section_desc, s.dept_id, d.dept_name, s.del_flag FROM tbl_section_mst AS s JOIN tbl_department_mst AS d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY s.section_id DESC, s.reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_section_mst ( section_name, section_sh_name, section_desc, dept_id, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{section_name}, #{section_sh_name}, #{section_desc}, #{dept_id}, 1 );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_section_mst SET section_name=#{section.section_name}, section_sh_name=#{section.section_sh_name}, section_desc=#{section.section_desc}, dept_id=#{section.dept_id}, update_id = 1 WHERE section_id = #{id}

UPDATE tbl_section_mst SET del_flag = 1 WHERE section_id IN
#{id}
